elements.label: 特別鳴謝
elements.description: Sonja & PK; Matt Hosty; Haley Uyrus, Norman Chalk, Jasper R, Thomas Wade, Michael Guan, Darren Liao, Eve Kimbrough, Joel Bridge, drgatos,  Erin Dalton, So La, Sean Shannon, Jakob Hajdus, Zachary Dearing, Indijohnson, Haoran Sun, Tobia Ronco, Olaf Stachowski, Aiuigi Sarig, Kamil Kozlowski, aljawn, Isyander, nsk, Marcel Möhring, IvyLili... 還有每一位反饋意見和bug的玩家。謝謝你們。.
